introduction.title: Why PptxGenJS?
introduction.content: PptxGenJS provides a pure JavaScript solution for creating professional PowerPoint presentations. No Python dependencies, no template files - just clean, modern JavaScript code that generates beautiful slides with SmartArt-style diagrams and rich formatting.

conclusion.title: Conclusion
points: PptxGenJS eliminates the complexity of template management
JavaScript ecosystem provides superior flexibility and performance
Direct API control ensures consistent, professional results
Perfect choice for modern web-based presentation generation
